title: Multiple instance learning: A survey of problem characteristics and applications

tldr.text: A comprehensive survey of the characteristics which define and differentiate the types of MIL problems is provided, providing insight on how the problem characteristics affect MIL algorithms, recommendations for future benchmarking and promising avenues for research.
